key.name: preload-engines
key.description: Preload engines during ibus starts up

key.name: engines-order
key.description: Saved engines order in input method list

key.name: switcher-delay-time
key.summary: Popup delay milliseconds for IME switcher window
key.description: Set popup delay milliseconds to show IME switcher window. The default is 400. 0 = Show the window immediately. 0 < Delay milliseconds. 0 > Do not show the window and switch prev/next engines.

key.name: version
key.description: The saved version number will be used to check the difference between the version of the previous installed ibus and one of the current ibus.

key.name: xkb-latin-layouts
key.summary: Latin layouts which have no ASCII
key.description: US layout is appended to the Latin layouts. variant can be omitted.

key.name: use-xmodmap
key.description: Run xmodmap if .xmodmap or .Xmodmap exists when ibus engines are switched.

key.name: use-system-keyboard-layout
key.description: Use system keyboard (XKB) layout

key.name: embed-preedit-text
key.description: Embed Preedit Text in Application Window

key.name: use-global-engine
key.description: Share the same input method among all applications

key.name: enable-by-default
key.description: Enable input method by default when the application gets input focus

key.name: dconf-preserve-name-prefixes
key.description: Prefixes of DConf keys to stop name conversion

key.name: trigger
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on or off

key.name: triggers
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on or off

key.name: enable-unconditional
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on

key.name: disable-unconditional
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method off

key.name: next-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the next input method in the list

key.name: next-engine-in-menu
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the next input method in the list

key.name: prev-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the previous input method

key.name: previous-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the previous input method

key.name: show
key.description: The behavior of property panel. 0 = Do not show, 1 = Auto hide, 2 = Always show

key.name: follow-input-cursor-when-always-shown
key.summary: Follow the input cursor in case the panel is always shown
key.description: If true, the panel follows the input cursor in case the panel is always shown. If false, the panel is shown at a fixed location.

key.name: auto-hide-timeout
key.summary: The milliseconds to show property panel
key.description: The milliseconds to show property panel after focus-in or properties are changed.

key.name: lookup-table-orientation
key.description: Orientation of lookup table. 0 = Horizontal, 1 = Vertical

key.name: show-icon-on-systray
key.description: Show icon on system tray

key.name: show-im-name
key.description: Show input method name on language bar

key.name: xkb-icon-rgba
key.description: XKB icon shows the layout string and the string is rendered with the RGBA value. The RGBA value can be 1. a color name from X11, 2. a hex value in form '#rrggbb' where 'r', 'g' and 'b' are hex digits of the red, green, and blue, 3. a RGB color in form 'rgb(r,g,b)' or 4. a RGBA color in form 'rgba(r,g,b,a)' where 'r', 'g', and 'b' are either integers in the range 0 to 255 or percentage values in the range 0% to 100%, and 'a' is a floating point value in the range 0 to 1 of the alpha.

key.name: property-icon-delay-time
key.summary: The milliseconds to show the panel icon for a property
key.description: The milliseconds to show the panel icon from the engine icon to a property icon whenever engines are switched if the property is specified by the value of icon-prop-key in IBusEngineDesc. If the value is 0, no delay time and the property icon is shown immediately.

key.name: use-custom-font
key.description: Use custom font name for language panel

key.name: custom-font
key.description: Custom font name for language panel

key.name: unicode-hotkey
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning Unicode typing on or off

key.name: hotkey
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning emoji typing on or off

key.name: font
key.description: Custom font name for emoji characters on emoji dialog

key.name: lang
key.description: Choose a default language of emoji dictionaries on the emoji dialog. The value $lang is applied to /usr/share/ibus/dicts/emoji-$lang.dict

key.name: favorites
key.summary: favorite emoji list on emoji dialog
key.description: You can show the favorite emojis on emoji list if this list has any characters.

key.name: favorite-annotations
key.summary: favorite emoji annotation list on emoji dialog
key.description: You can assign an annotation for a favorite emoji in this list.

key.name: has-partial-match
key.summary: Whether emoji annotations can be match partially or not
key.description: Whether emoji annotations can be matched with a partial string instead of the exact match or not.

key.name: partial-match-length
key.summary: Match emoji annotations with the specified length
key.description: Match emoji annotations partially with more than the specified number of characters instead of the exact match.

key.name: partial-match-condition
key.summary: Choose a condition to match emoji annotations partially
key.description: Choose one of the following conditions to match emoji annotations partially: 0 == Prefix match, 1 == Suffix match, 2 == Containing match

key.name: load-emoji-at-startup
key.summary: Load the emoji data at the time of startup
key.description: Load the emoji data at the time of startup if true. About 10MB memory is needed to load the data. Load the emoji data when open the emoji dialog at the beginning if false.

key.name: load-unicode-at-startup
key.summary: Load the Unicode data at the time of startup
key.description: Load the Unicode data at the time of startup if true. About 15MB memory is needed to load the data. Load the Unicode data when open the emoji dialog at the beginning if false. The Unicode data is always loaded after the emoji data is loaded even if true.
